content: keep yourself warm with this crochet **solid hexagons throw blanket** make it in your favorite color combo or leftover yarn and create the perfect afghan for your living room *this pattern is written in us terms* **materials** 5 5-mm e/4 us 9 uk crochet hook aran 4 medium weight yarn tapestry needle **yarn & yardage** i used **paintbox yarns simply aran** *201 yards / 184 meters per 100 g* in the following colors and amounts a champagne white 202 728 yds 666 m b pistachio green 224 1007 yds 922 m c slate green 226 1051 yds 962 m d jewel 72 406 yds 372 m **size** 55 140 cm by 70 178 cm **gauge** two rounds of a solid hexagon should measure 2 5 6 4 cm from side to side and 2 75 7 cm from tip to opposite tip in the longest dimension **copyright** please remember that this pattern and the pictures shown here are the property of raffamusadesigns com feel free to use the patterns to make and sell your finished products but you are not allowed to republish or distribute this pattern or parts of this pattern in any way please do not use photos from raffamusa designs in your listings **follow me** **blog** https //raffamusadesigns com/ **youtube** https //www youtube com/channel/uczqyp_l6lj8_ic3fcq30wjg **facebook** https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns **instagram** https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs/ **pinterest** https //www pinterest it/raffamusadesigns/_created/ **ravelry** https //www ravelry com/designers/raffaella-tassoni
